TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakStartedEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当对象引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> 事件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>时, 将创建的实例。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 当<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>、或方法<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>中的任何一种提示开始时, 将引发事件。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>
类没有属性, 并且不会<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>从事件返回数据。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> 提供它是为了使应用程序作者能够编写<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件的事件处理程序。
